snippet: The choices by Prime Minister Hesham Qandil included some holdovers from the military-backed team but few Islamist ministers.
abstract: Egyptian state media releases the names of more than half the ministers in the next cabinet, selections that include few members of the Muslim Brotherhood's party and several belonging to the past, military-backed government; the appointments suggest that Pres Mohamed Morsi is attempting to assuage fears that the Muslim Brotherhood is seeking to consolidate power.
lead_paragraph: The choices by Prime Minister Hesham Qandil included some holdovers from the military-backed team but few Islamist ministers.

headline.seo: Egypt Releases Partial List of Cabinet Ministers
headline.main: Egypt Releases Partial List of Ministers
headline.print_headline: Egypt Releases Partial List Of Ministers
